attributes.review: i tried to get on to see what’s up n maybe at least know what’s happening from trump. then as soon i got on it my phone started glitching . i thought it was just a glitch so i turned phone all the way off then turned it back on. my phone was still glitching so i put it on charge. i thought if i just have to change the plug hole for my phone so i charged it on the shelf on top my fish bowl n while on charge my phone accidentally fell on my fish bowl . my favorite first best friend fish name FRED. it knocked him so bad he just went yeet to the other side of the bowl😭 if it wasn’t for this glitch app this wouldn’t happen .. fix it or it’s going to harm others while getting on .
attributes.title: this was horrible it killed my fish

attributes.review: This app is the WORST thing I have ever downloaded! It refused to open and every time I would click on the app, it would either restart my phone or freeze my phone so bad that I would have to restart it!! But some how it had the audacity to send me notifications and alerts when it didnt even want to open! The amount of alerts I got was RIDICULOUS and it completely slowed my phone down! If it was up to me than I would have given no stars AND shut down the app for how USELESS it is. I am so DISAPPOINTED and cant believe I wasted my PRECIOUS TIME TO DOWNLOAD THIS APP! It must be racist or something because of how SLOW it made my phone. WILL NOT RECOMMEND AND HOPE IT SHUTS DOWN!😌🧚🏽🧚🏽🧚🏽✨✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: I gave a start because no stars was not an option

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with all of the latest news from everyone’s favorite president! Even tho he looks like a Malibu Barbie dipped in Cheeto dust I figured I would go ahead and give him the benefit of the doubt!!!! I was on a walk with my giraffe on the boardwalk but suddenly my phone started blowing up! It was trump himself, sending me his pick up lines that I really didn’t want to hear. No thank you!!!!!!!!!! I don’t want that in my feed, it’s not good for geralds (the giraffe) well being. I don’t want him subjected to the horrible world we live in. Anyhow, this app is horrible. I don’t want people and Gerald thinking that I support his horrible attempt at trying to make me fall in love with the Orange. Don’t download this app.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review:
Hi so I know we just met but I want to tell you something secret. I don’t want to say this publicly but this app is blackmailing me. I tiptoe. There I said it. At night I do it -no noise -all secret I go everywhere. I go to public toilets, I go check on the sleeping neighbours nicely always very kind. My Fitbit count is the best, the number is higher than the wealth that our president keeps for himself. So as a snack to compensate  I eat the rich. Gross it’s like couscous sooo hard to stomach but someone had to do it. I will tiptoe with pride from now on. My tiptoes will cross the nation, I will go for the unethical CEOs for nutrition and then on to the -%}^}*+} censorship. It’s the reality don’t censor man. Gen zzzzzzzz will put you to sleep awe so sweet we love melatonin!!!!  

-the squirrel outside of the White House
attributes.title: Tiptoe

attributes.review: as an american i i downloaded this app. i can feel all my imagination being replaced with wrinkled up cheetos- i am REVOLTED- and this is NOT okay. please get rid of it 🤢 it makes my phone melt and emit fumes that nothing should make. 💔 everyday after i use this app my world turns a little oranger. every fruit is starting to look like an orange and every potato looks like a cheeto... and then next thing you know, my hands look feverish and orange, they are becoming pruned up and enlarging. i can feel my body becoming larger and my steps more sluggish. THIS IS WHAT THIS APP DOES TO YOU. it is unfair and annoying. my hair is also starting to look thin and white and i am concerned. please put this app under review, it isn't good for the people. 😿😿😿😿
attributes.title: This app is DISGUSTING!

attributes.review: i downloaded the app with high hopes and because i love cheesy cheetos but i was greatly disappointed when i found out that the cheeto was a pedo- chile anyways this app gave me bugs it attacked my cat and now my cat keeps humping the wall. a day later i wake to a large sound and see a human sized cheeto yelling at me and threats to chop my fetus sized face off. have😒you😜ever😎been😓snaked 🐍by🤨a👃friend 👩‍👦and🙃just😋for😕the🌶clout🤓they’ll 😡do😖it🌪again👨‍🔧now that i’ve pointed out the huge problems i’ll help fix this app. first i think a name change is in need. how about sanders 2020. also can we- ah what am i saying theirs no hope for this app. get rid of it. also. this is payback. 🦄 you take our app we take yours. love x gen z

attributes.title: Horrifically Horrible

attributes.review: I went in this app cuz I fell in the shower and couldn’t get up🛁🩸, but as soon as I opened this app, an orange Cheeto man 🍊👨‍🦱, so called trumpie 👀👅🔪, aww shawty you fine, I mean what nothing, anyways as soon as I opened this app he sent a huge Godzilla half Cheeto half panda after and jumped behind my bestfriend 🥰💕 and BOOM! Ripped her spine out😢🖤📌 while she was making tiktoks on her treadmill🖨, and I was sitting, minding my own buisness eating my turtle🐢 and then I saw her dead Burger King body 🎏, so then I became bestfriends with the panda 🐼 and we had a picnic with killer bees, while watching the black lives matter protest, but out of now where the panda killed me in cold blood. If you want you and your bestie to live I recommend not getting this app period.
attributes.title: Terrible! I hate it! Cheeto man

attributes.review: I’d will never get this app again it has made the Coronavirus worse since I have bought this app every time I go out I see people coughing over and over again one time I was going on the Starbucks line and this bird coughed in my drink not only that I have been having dreams about my microwave out to get me and my oven out to get me not only that I woke up with my hair burnt Casper tried to flat iron my hair but instead he burnt it this app has also given my phone I virus I can’t text my ex when I am drunk anymore and ask him for advice about how to get him back I can’t email my boss saying I’m sick anymore and I can’t even see my screen so this app should be gone I would advise y’all to not get this app 😢
attributes.userName: its a party in the us
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for my candied orange slice. But I DO NOT RECOMMEND getting it. It was a terrible experience because my entire house disappeared! I went to go find an off switch but then I was swallowed as well. Apparently this app sends monsters to your house to devour everything in sight! I still can’t find my poor candied orange slice. He was quite the nice companion. Oh and sitting inside of this monster is very very uncomfortable. I can’t find any of my favorite colors or eat any of my favorite socks! I was so disappointed to see that my cat has not continued to eat rainbows. I think it is due to the very outdated and blown up space. It’s not even fluent in here! Anyways please take this app off because people can sleep better.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: When I got this app it showed a picture of my water bottle in Arkansas and since I can’t drive yet I had to LITERALLY walk there. Got home and I was transported into space where the aliens were and they were surprisingly very EVIL but I liked them. They also took my phone that I thought was in my hand and threw it, I had to cannon ball into space to retrieve my cellular device. This app asked me if I wanted Burger King and I was taken back because I only eat McDonald’s and I thought they knew that so that’s like the main why I’m upset. But they burned my H2O so I guess I have to sue them. this adventure took my 2884 seconds... they literally wasted come minutes of watching or even doing something else. SO DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP LITERALLY DO NOT
